Articles.Content:
**The Challenge**

Fly to the MÃ¼n.

**Comments**

It\'s literally that easy... or is it?

Personally, I don\'t think it\'s gonna be all that easy. 

Trying to get an air breathing jet engine to give you enough speed to get far enough into orbit that RCS can fly you to the MÃ¼n. 

Yes, you\'re reading that correctly. No liquid fuel engines. No SRBs. Just air breathing turbines. (a ram jet is still a turbine, right?) 

Video would be preferable to see that there really wasnt any liquid fuel engines used... 

**After thought**

If you can get back to Kerbin, awesome. If not, oh well. Not a requirement.

If this turns out to be not that hard, then lets see who can do it in the smallest jet. ![^_^](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_happy.png)

SERIOUSLY! Don't post a challenge unless it's actually possible! Do it yourself first, and actually put some thought into it! Turbojets lose thrust at high speeds! [Here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82157-A-detailed-look-at-Kerbal-s-jet-engines)'s a chart illustrating that. Please get a mod to take this down.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-11-30T17:19:17Z" title="11/30/2014 05:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">November 30, 2014</time> by NeatCrown**

> 
> SERIOUSLY! Don't post a challenge unless it's actually possible! Do it yourself first, and actually put some thought into it! Turbojets have 0 thrust when moving at high speeds (1.5km/s)! [Here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82157-A-detailed-look-at-Kerbal-s-jet-engines)'s a chart illustrating that. Please get a mod to take this down.

SERIOUSLY! THIS THREAD IS TWO, READ 2, YEARS DEAD!

Holy necro, of necros, this is like raising King Tut!

> 
> SERIOUSLY! Don't post a challenge unless it's actually possible! Do it yourself first, and actually put some thought into it! Turbojets lose thrust at high speeds! [Here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82157-A-detailed-look-at-Kerbal-s-jet-engines)'s a chart illustrating that. Please get a mod to take this down.

Yep...

Two things though. Please be mindful of the dates when you dig up a post. Also, maybe don't be so rough on people when you post about it. This was definitely a challenge in it's day.

Cheers,

~Claw

So it's back to Davy Jones' locker for this thread...
